title: cauldron 不支持BC吗.....
author: q691021659
txt_content:
输入传送指令会没有反映 如果多输入了几次就会提Already connecting to this server!
还有could not connect to default server, please try again later: java.net.connectExeption

这是在cauldron端里提示的错误
[12:28:04 INFO]: RaJjie lost connection: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.ti
meout.ReadTimeoutException 
之前几个spigot的端互相传送没有一点问题的........
